long_description: The Nathan StrobeLight is bright, small, lightweight and easily attached to your running clothes. It offers the perfect amount of light to keep you seen while logging miles. LED bulbs cast even, white light; nearly indestructible LEDs greatly improve battery life. HIgh-visibility blinking and steady light modes keep you seen from a safe distance. Attach the light directly to your belt or clothing. Water-resistant design is perfect for all weather conditions.
short_description: The Nathan StrobeLight is bright, small, lightweight and easily attached to your running clothes. It offers the perfect amount of light to keep you seen while logging miles.
